trends: There have been no other sightings in Independence
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: believe car was abducted with me in it
divs: Sighting Details i was driving from independence to elk city a 12mile drive which takes no longer than 15 minutes. the last thing i remember isthe Dollar General Store. next thing I know we are in another county at anothercity. James cant remember anything either. we turned aruond and came back toelk city. the whole trip shouldnt have taken more than 30 minutes. when welooked at the clock 1 hour and 15 minutes had passed since leaving independence.it feel like the car had been abducted by aliens. i might add that ever since imoved here i have been able to feel them.
